gallery_extensionfactory_promo.description: Check out our other great extensions and web apps at http://www.extensionfactory.com
gallery_extensionfactory_promo.message: Tjek vores andre fantastiske extensions og web-applikationer på http://www.extensionfactory.com

gallery_features_search_for_places.description: - Search by city or zip code

gallery_help_us.description: Help us to make this application better!
gallery_help_us.message: Hjælp os med at gøre denne applikation bedre!

gallery_help_us_comments.description: - we're happy to read and reply to your comments as well.
gallery_help_us_comments.message: - vi vil være glade for at læse og svare på dine kommentarer.

gallery_help_us_stars.description: - if you like this product, please give it stars :)
gallery_help_us_stars.message: - Hvis du kan lide dette produkt, bedes du give den stjerner:)

gallery_privacy_browsing_history.description: - we do NOT store your browsing history! Although access to the chrome.tabs API is required, the application will never look or save your history. Please read http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/permission_warnings.html#warnings for more information.
gallery_privacy_browsing_history.message: - Vi gemmer ikke din browser historie! Selvom adgangen til chrome.tabs API er påkrævet, vil programmet aldrig se eller gemme din historie. Læs venligst http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/permission_warnings.html#warnings for mere information.

gallery_privacy_personal_data.description: - we do NOT send any data to any third party servers.
gallery_privacy_personal_data.message: - Vi sender IKKE nogen data til tredjepart servere.

gallery_weather_app_features_geolocation.description: - Instant geolocation and localization: get forecasts in your language
gallery_weather_app_features_geolocation.message: - Øjeblikkelig Geolocation og lokalisering: Få prognoser på dit sprog

gallery_weather_app_features_manage_favo.description: - Quick access to your favorite places
gallery_weather_app_features_manage_favo.message: - Hurtig adgang til dine foretrukne steder

gallery_weather_app_features_notificatio.description: - Real time notifications on weather changes

search_city_input_placeholder.description: Enter a city or zip code (default text in the search box)

weather_app_description.description: This application geolocates you and displays in one click your favorite location weather forecasts.
weather_app_description.message: Denne applikation geolokaliserer dig og viser i et enkelt klik vejrudsigter for dine favoritsteder.

weather_gallery_description.message: Vejrudvidelsen finder dig automatisk geografisk, og viser herefter vejrudsigten i den nærmeste by. Et browser-ikon giver dig en daglig prognose og temperatur.

weather_notifications_forecast_label.description: display notification on weather forecast change (checkbox)
weather_notifications_forecast_label.message: Vis notifikation om ændringer i vejrudsigt

weather_notifications_present_label.description: display notification on daily weather updates (checkbox)
weather_notifications_present_label.message: vis notifikation om daglige opdateringer om vejret

weather_present_updated_label.description: Weather of the day has been updated !
